meanings.definition: To clean or polish (a car) as a valet.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I valeted my car to make it shiny.
meanings.sent2: The car was valeted by the professional service.
meanings.sent3: The car valeted itself magically overnight!
meanings.sent4: She valeted the car with such precision, it sparkled like a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The car looked brand new after being valeted.

meanings.definition: A person employed to clean and take care of cars.
meanings.sent1: The valeted at the hotel always keeps the cars spotless.
meanings.sent2: The valeted took great pride in his work.
meanings.sent3: The valeted told funny stories while cleaning the cars.
meanings.sent4: She was like a guardian angel, the valeted of the vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The valeted knew every car inside out.
